T02D3512:158b-1: a'arya dz'am gu ly'a bha ga ba ty'a: kalpa /
T02D3512:158b-3: bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma dug sel ba'i rtog pa /
T02D3512:158b-4: 'phags ma dug sel ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3512:158b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thugs kyi rtog pa bdag gis bshad par bgyi'o //
T02D3512:158b-6: aom aa si shu la dzi hve dzi hve badzra
T02D3512:158b-7: k'a yee gra sa gra sa dzva la dzva la
T02D3512:158b-8: ma h'a dzva me la h'a yo ge shva ri
T02D3512:158b-9: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a ;
T02D3512:158b-10: stong phrag bcu bzlas pas dug gi las thams cad zhi bar nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D3512:158b-11: bzlas pa yang cho ga 'dis bya'o //
T02D3512:158b-12: dus gsum du khrus byas nas chang dang /
T02D3512:158b-17: tshva rnams rnam par spangs te dus gsum du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3512:158b-18: ji srid stong phrag bcu'i bar du'o //
T02D3512:158b-19: de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D3512:158b-20: phyi nas 'di rnam par bkod nas las rnams bya'o //
T02D3512:158b-21: dang po re zhig sngags pas bdag nyid 'di ltar bsam par bya ste /
T02D3512:158b-22: gzhon nu ma'i rnam pa sku mdog ljang gu /
T02D3512:158b-23: gdengs ka bdun gyis dbu la rnam par brgyan pa ;
T02D3512:158b-26: phyag dang po na rtse gsum /
T02D3512:158b-27: gnyis pa na rma bya'i mjug sgro /
T02D3512:158b-29: bzhi pa na mi 'jigs pa rab tu brkyang pa /
T02D3512:158b-30: yan lag thams cad la zhabs gdub dang /
T02D3512:159a-0: rna rgyan la sogs pa sbrul gyi rnam @159a * //
T02D3512:159a-2: ba spu'i khung bu re re nas me 'bar zhing
T02D3512:159a-3: kun nas 'byung ba dang ldan pa rnam par bsam
T02D3512:159a-4: par bya'o // de bzhin du bdag nyid brtag par bya'o //
T02D3512:159a-5: bdag gis re zhig lha rnams la de nas sbrul
T02D3512:159a-6: gyis bzung ba de'i mdun du bkod nas zangs ma
T02D3512:159a-7: la sogs pa'i snod du chu la bzhag na rig
T02D3512:159a-8: sngags lan bdun du mngon par bsngags nas de la
T02D3512:159a-9: lan bdun du mgo bo la sogs pa la dug
T02D3512:159a-10: rnams byabs nas chu de la de bzhin du yang
T02D3512:159a-13: g-yo ba'i dug la gang dang gang la de bzhin
T02D3512:159a-14: du gtong ba de dang de'i gnas la lan bdun
T02D3512:159a-15: bzlas te / gang la gzungs kyis bcings shing /
T02D3512:159a-16: sbrul gyi rnam par 'khyil bar sbyor bar bya'o //
T02D3512:159a-17: 'di'i phyag rgya ni sbrul gyi rnam pa'o //
T02D3512:159a-18: phu:zhes pas gtong zhing mche ba'i rma'i yan lag las dug 'thungs pa bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D3512:159a-19: de lta bus las grub par 'gyur zhing gzhan du ni ma yin no //
